thread.title: Fifty Shades screenwriter Kelly Marcel tackling Disney's live-action Cruella de Vil movie - Movies
thread.title_full: Fifty Shades screenwriter Kelly Marcel tackling Disney's live-action Cruella de Vil movie - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Tasha Hegarty
title: Fifty Shades screenwriter Kelly Marcel tackling Disney's live-action Cruella de Vil movie - Movies
text: The wheels are finally in motion for Disney's live-action Cruella de Vil movie.Fifty Shades of Grey screenwriter Kelly Marcel will pen the script for 101 Dalmations spinoff Cruella, which is now being fast-tracked by the studio, according to The Hollywood Reporter. Â© Rex Features / Everett Collection Downton Abbey star Lily James will play the title role, while Kenneth Branagh will be in the directing chair.Cruella is one of several live-action movies Disney currently has in the pipeline.Jon Favreau's The Jungle Book, Tim Burton's sequel Alice Through the Looking Glass and Bill Condon's Beauty and the Beast are all currently filming or in post-production.Glenn Close previously played Cruella in the live-action version of 101 Dalmatians in 1996 and its 2000 sequel 102 Dalmatians.
